item.title: Mark Ruffalo Hasn’t Seen a ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ Script Yet but “Can’t Wait to Work With” Jon Bernthal’s Punisher
item.description: The ‘Task’ actor, also known as the Hulk in the MCU, tells The Hollywood Reporter that Bernthal, “plays that character like nobody else,” and he’s “really excited to meet him.”
